blogs.title: DK Products E-Commerce Website
blogs.content:
### DK Products E-Commerce Website

I built a conceptual e-commerce website for a brand called DK Products. The website includes product listings, categories, a shopping cart, and a checkout interface. This project helped me practice modern frontend development and user experience design.

**Technologies:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React

blogs.title: HeyBuddy Chat Application
blogs.content:
### HeyBuddy Chat Application

HeyBuddy is a React-based chat application that allows real-time messaging between users. I implemented real-time notifications, message storage, and a responsive UI.

**Technologies:** React, Node.js, Firebase, WebSocket

blogs.title: Lifeline Mental Health App
blogs.content:
### Lifeline Mental Health App

Developed with Tecxa, Lifeline is a mental health app aimed at supporting schools and workplaces. It includes mood tracking, counseling resources, and reminders for mental wellness activities.

**Technologies:** React Native, React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS

blogs.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge Weather App
blogs.content:
### NASA Space Apps Challenge Weather App

Created a weather app for the NASA Space Apps Challenge Colombo 2025. The app predicts weather up to 3 years ahead using advanced algorithms and APIs. We won 1st place and became global nominees.

**Technologies:** React, API, Forecasting, Data Visualization

blogs.title: SMART POS System
blogs.content:
### SMART POS System

Developed a point-of-sale system for a spice-selling company using Java Swing and MySQL. The system handles sales, inventory management, and report generation.

**Technologies:** Java Swing, MySQL, OOP

blogs.title: Montessori Static Website
blogs.content:
### Montessori Static Website

Built a static website for a Montessori school showcasing services, staff, and enrollment information. Focused on clean UI and responsive design.

**Technologies:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript

blogs.title: UniLink University App
blogs.content:
### UniLink University App

UniLink allows students to schedule personal lectures with lecturers and communicate through a WhatsApp-like interface for university scenarios. Also includes a React web app for admin to manage users and schedules.

**Technologies:** React, Node.js, Firebase, UI/UX

blogs.title: Smart Drone Pod App
blogs.content:
### Smart Drone Pod App

Led a group of 8 members to create an app for managing smart drone pods as part of a research project in our degree program. The app includes monitoring, scheduling, and data analytics for drones.

**Technologies:** React, Node.js, IoT, Team Leadership
